verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Lord, lift me up and let me stand,
By faith, on heaven’s table land,
A higher plane than

verse.name: c1b
v1a
v1b
verse.lines:
Still praying as I onward bound,
“Lord, plant my feet
on higher ground.”

verse.name: v2a
v2b
verse.lines:
Tho’ some may dwell
where these abound’
My prayer, my aim,
is higher ground.

verse.name: v3a
v3b
verse.lines:
For faith has caught
the joyful sound,
The song of saints
on higher ground.

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
I want to scale
the utmost height,
And catch a gleam
of glory bright;

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
But still I’ll pray till heaven
I’ve found,
“Lord, lead me on to
higher ground.”
